page.title: 07The beach
page.content: { { {Recreation:The Beach { }A lot of people come to take their dogs for a walk on the beach.Some people come to walk or to look at the wildlife.Sometimes they come to fly kites or to play with their remote control cars. There is dog dirt and litter from people on the beach.Many barrels, bottles and wood get washed up on the shore.The sea is not very clean at Crosby beach.The area has been heavily vandalised.There was a pitch and putt course(a small golf course)but this closed because of vandalism.The beach needs more facilities-at the moment it is not nice at all.A wallwas built along the beach to stop the erosion of the coast,as there was heavy erosion in the past.
